attributes.action: Keep The Post Office In 100% Public Ownership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Post Office is a PUBLIC SERVICE and is CUSTODIAN of Her Majesty's mail.  This petition calls on and instructs the Government to retain it in 100% public ownership.
Public Services should be treated in a different way to companies. They are about service ahead of profit for profits sake.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
